resources.string: 1.Hunters must always be on the hunt for something.
2.Hunters must have a minimal understanding of martial arts. This includes learning Nen.
3.Once a Hunter is licensed, that license cannot be revoked for any reason. However, a license will not be reissued for any reason.
4.Hunters shall not target other Hunters unless they commit heinous crimes.
5.One star is given to a Hunter who produces remarkable achievements in a particular field.
6.Two stars are given to a Hunter who fulfills the Five Articles, holds an official position and has mentored a junior Hunter who is awarded a star.
7.Three stars are given to a Hunter who fulfills the Six Articles and produces remarkable achievements in multiple fields.
Please make sure you have entered the right Password/Username.
